data.comment: The match is underway at EDION Stadium.
Throw-in for Shonan at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 1, Hiroshima's Yuya Asano breaks free at EDION Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hiroshima.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 2, Koichiro Fukushima signals a Shonan throw-in in Hiroshima's half.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Hiroshima.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 3, Free kick Shonan.
Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
Shonan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in Hiroshima.
Hiroshima are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Shonan.
Koichiro Fukushima awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Shonan at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 14, Hiroshima's Sho Sasaki has been booked in Hiroshima.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
Throw-in Shonan.
In the minute 18, Hiroshima are pushing forward but Yuya Asano's finish is wide of the goal.
Shonan have a goal kick.
Hiroshi Ibusuki (Shonan) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 21, Hiroshi Ibusuki gets his shot on target but fails to score for Shonan.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hiroshima's Rhayner is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 26, Shonan to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 28, In Hiroshima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Hiroshima push forward at EDION Stadium and Leandro Pereira gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Shonan defence.
In Hiroshima Hiroshima attack through Toshihiro Aoyama. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 30, Koichiro Fukushima awards Shonan a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
In Hiroshima, Hiroshima push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 35, Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Leandro Pereira (Hiroshima) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 45, Koichiro Fukushima signals a throw-in for Hiroshima, close to Shonan's area.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Koichiro Fukushima blows to end the first-half.
Yuya Asano is on target to give Hiroshima a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 45, That's a fine assist from Sho Sasaki.
The second-half has started.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Hiroshima.
In the minute 46, It's a goal kick for the home team in Hiroshima.
In the minute 46, Yuki Ohashi is replacing Yuto Iwasaki for the away team.
The away team have replaced Kazuaki Mawatari with Shota Kobayashi. This is the first substitution made today by Bin Ukishima.
Hiroshima's Hayao Kawabe misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
In the minute 49, Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Hiroshima.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Hiroshima in their own half.
Shonan to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
Shonan have a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Hiroshima drives forward and Leandro Pereira gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 56, Koichiro Fukushima signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Shonan's half.
Free kick Shonan.
Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
In the minute 58, Goal kick for Shonan at EDION Stadium.
Throw-in for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 65, Shonan drive upfield and Akito Fukuta gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Hiroshima defender.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 67, Bin Ukishima (Shonan) is making a third substitution, with Temma Matsuda replacing Akito Fukuta.
Naoki Ishihara is on a sub for Hiroshi Ibusuki for Shonan.
Koichiro Fukushima awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 70, Tomoya Fujii is replacing Yoshifumi Kashiwa for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
Hiroshi Jofuku is making the team's second substitution at EDION Stadium with Shunki Higashi replacing Yuya Asano.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
Important block from the Shonan defence as Tsukasa Morishima fires in a strike for Hiroshima.
Tsukasa Morishima of Hiroshima smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 75, Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Corner awarded to Shonan.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hiroshima make their third substitution with Yusuke Chajima replacing Rhayner.
Throw-in Shonan.
In the minute 79, Leandro Pereira for Hiroshima drives towards goal at EDION Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
In the minute 82, Shonan needs to be cautious. Hiroshima have an attacking throw-in.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
In the minute 84, Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Leandro Pereira (Hiroshima) strikes – and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Shonan in their own half.
The away team replace Yuki Ohashi with Tarik Elyounoussi.
Gakuto Notsuda is on a sub for Tsukasa Morishima for Hiroshima.
In the minute 89, Hiroshima are coming forward and Leandro Pereira gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Shonan at EDION Stadium.
Hiroshima drive upfield and Tomoya Fujii gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Shonan defender.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Hiroshima have a dangerous throw-in.
Hiroshima are whistled for offside.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
Mitsuki Saito has recovered and rejoins the match in Hiroshima.
Hiroshima's Gakuto Notsuda looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
Throw-in for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
Corner awarded to Shonan.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
That's full-time at EDION Stadium. The final score is 1-0.
Leandro Pereira (Hiroshima) has received a first yellow card.
Gakuto Notsuda is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Mitsuki Saito is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Mitsuki Saito for Shonan has been booked by Koichiro Fukushima and receives a first yellow card.
